panels.description: How much memory is being utilized in each node pool
panels.title: Memory Utilization / Node pool

panels.description: How much memory is currently in use
panels.title: Used

panels.description: The total memory in the cluster
panels.title: Total

panels.description: How much CPU is being utilized over 1 min interval in each node pool

targets.expr:
sum(instance:node_cpu_utilisation:rate5m * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"aks-meniga.*", node=~"$node"}) 
  / 
sum(instance:node_num_cpu:sum * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"aks-meniga.*", node=~"$node"})

sum(instance:node_cpu_utilisation:rate5m * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"aks-monitoring.*", node=~"$node"}) 
  / 
sum(instance:node_num_cpu:sum * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"aks-monitoring.*", node=~"$node"})

sum(instance:node_cpu_utilisation:rate5m * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"aks-system.*", node=~"$node"}) 
  / 
sum(instance:node_num_cpu:sum * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"aks-system.*", node=~"$node"})

panels.description: NGINX request success rate over time per ingress
panels.title: Success Rate (non-4|5xx responses)

panels.description: Ingress errors over time for 2 minute intervals
panels.title: Success Rate (non-4|5xx responses)

panels.description: How many HelmReleases are in a failed state
panels.title: HelmRelease Errors

panels.description: List helm releases in a failed state
panels.title: Failed Helm Releases

targets.expr: sum(max by(namespace, node, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", node=~"$node"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))
